titles.title: East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act
East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act
East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act
East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act
East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act
East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to extend a water contract between the United States and the East Bench Irrigation District.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 112-129.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman under authority of the order of the Senate of 08/02/2011 without amendment. With written report No. 112-65.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 145.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Subcommittee on Water and Power Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 112-527.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 375.

action.text: Mr. Hastings (WA) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 997.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/27/2012--Public Law. East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to extend a contract for water services between the United States and the East Bench Irrigation District, numbered 14-06-600-3593, until the earlier of four years after the date on which the contract would have expired if this Act had not been enacted or the date on which a new long-term contract is executed by the parties to the contract.
